availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Russ Haynes (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, physician. Otsego County, New York native. Married to Mary Ladd Haynes in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1848. Physician in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Campbell County in July 1863. Physician in Indianapolis, Marion County, Indiana, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 523.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Campbell County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 106.
"A Native of Morris Killed," The Morris Chronicle (Morris, NY), March 19, 1902, p. 3.
"John R. Haynes (1823-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial 91017780, accessed May 15, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/91017780.
